column1: What is the purpose of a business Offer?
column2: business Offers enable you to showcase offers of your business on your business, to attract more fans to your business. business Offers can increase your sales as displaying them on your business could get customers interested in availing the deals offered by you.

column1: Who all can create Offers on my business?
column2: The business Admins of your business can create Offers for your business.

column1: What are Sponsored business Offers? How can Offers created on my business be made Sponsored?
column2:
Sponsored business Offers are those Offers which have been created for Paid businesses. These Sponsored Offers will appear in the “Sponsored Offers” block in the “Offers” section under business navigation. On “Browse Offers” for business Offers and in search results, they are marked with a “Sponsored” marker. The search form for business Offers also has a quick filter for seeing Sponsored Offers.
If your business is created under a Paid Package, then the Offers created for it would automatically be made Sponsored. The availability of Paid business Packages on our site is conditional depending on the settings configured by our site administrators.

column1: What are Featured business Offers? Who can mark Offers for businesses as Featured?
column2:
From amongst the offers that a business would have on this site, the business Admins will be able to choose a particular offer as “Featured”. In the “Offers” tab of a business, the Featured Offer appears on top in the listing of offers. A business’s Featured Offer also appears alongside the business’s entry in “Browse businesses” and results of searching of businesses.
business Admins can mark one of their business Offers as “Featured”.

column1: What are Hot business Offers? Who can mark Offers for businesses as Hot?
column2:
Hot business Offers are offers of businesses which are specially marked as “Hot”. Such offers are more highlighted than others and thus gain more visibility. Hot Offers appear in the “Hot business Offers” block in the “Offers” section under business navigation. On “Browse Offers” for business Offers and in search results, Hot Offers are marked with a “Hot Offer” marker. The search form for business Offers also has a quick filter for seeing Hot Offers.
business Offers can be marked “Hot” only by our site administrators.

column1: I want to search for a specific business Offer. How can I do that?
column2: You can search for a business Offer using the detailed search box available in the “Offers” section under business navigation.

column1: I have a business on this site. However, the Offers feature is not available for my business. What could be the reason?
column2:
The reason why Offers feature is not available for your business could be that, you might have chosen a Package for your business for which the Offers App is not available. In this case, you can see if choosing a different Package with the Offers App suits you. You can change the Package for your business from the “Packages” section of your business Dashboard.
Availability of Packages for businesses, and their features are conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.
